name: The Tale of Stargazer
description:
Almost 20 ly away from Sol, Stargazer, a crew member of the ship Kanzi ru Miso, has to return home. They're not alone, both Kanzi and Miso are there with them!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Based on my 'album', "The Tale of Stargazer", it's the story of a crew member from Kanzi ru Miso, the first interstellar ship, from a distant future. In it's maiden voyage, there was an accident, and the ship was lost.

People of Sol-III (Earth) gave up interstellar travel after that, and all research towards space exploration was used to explore the Sol system.

But then, an ancient ship, centuries old, arrives in the system. This ship brings an interesting story... 

Crew member and the ship's computers, working together to accomplish their goal: to get back home.

These computers, Kanzi and Miso (namesake of the ship), seem to be more than just computers. No one knows if that's real, or it was just Stargazer's bias in their logs....

But that's just the version of the people of Sol-III. To see what happened, according to Stargazer, be sure to play the game!

 - Leaping Frog

Game Boy Controls:

Enter = Start

Shift = Select (not used)

Arrows/WASD = D-pad

Z/J/Ctrl = A (interact/run)

X/K/Alt = B (jump (not used, but may get you unstuck in case of collision box problems))

If your browser supports controllers, you may use one as well : )
